A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually stunning but unfortunately the story was a mess. Pointless side character stories and poor editing makes this movie a bit of a mission to watch. Characters that were built up in episode 7 were discarded with little further development and weird force abilities make this a disappointing film on par with the prequels. As much as I wanted to see Luke Skywalker again\, I feel this movie has completely missed what made the originals so fun and inspiring.
